rounds.comments: (Katie: Each response includes one of those two words.)

clues.text: A recent theory says the teeth-on-lip consonants "F" & "V" evolved as chewing softer foods gave more humans this condition

rounds.text: When the city of Podgorica became capital of Montenegro after WWII, it was renamed in his honor
